other_title: 哆啦A梦 大雄的恐龙 (Chinese (PRC))
映画ドラえもん のび太の恐竜 (Japanese)
plot: Nobita finds a fossilized dinosaur egg by accident, and with the help of Doraemon's tools, they hatched the egg and began raising the dinosaur. Knowing that they can't keep the dinosaur forever, Nobita was forced to send it back to prehistoric times where a group of hunters from the future threatens to endanger the dinosaurs. Determined to save the dinosaurs from the claws of the hunters, Doraemon and the gang returns to the past and sets out in a prehistoric adventure.
opening_theme: "Boku Doraemon" (ぼくドラえもん) by Nobuyo Ōyama & Koorogi '73
ending_theme: "Pocket no Naka ni" (ポケットの中に) by Nobuyo Ōyama & Young Fresh
insert_song: "Doraemon no Uta" (ドラえもんのうた) by Kumiko Ōsugi & Nobuyo Ōyama
